<center>
**Who are we: The SLU bioinformatics infrastructure**

Sveriges lantbruksuniversitet - Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences


Our goal is to provide support and training in bioinformatics for SLU staff, and to build a strong community of bioinformaticians within SLU. Our staff is located on the 3 SLU campuses in Ultuna, Ume√• and Alnarp. We want to join forces and coordinate teaching activities, common resources (hardware, software).
